item.title: I feel like there is nowhere that is not poisoned by extremism.
item.description: I feel absolutely gutted, and I’m not really sure what to do anymore. I’m writing this from a pit of absolute fucking depression that I’m not even sure I want to climb out of. For context: I was in the Army for eight years. I served in Afghanistan and was honorably discharged. Twelve years later, I developed a combination of service-connected physical and mental health issues—PTSD, depression, and other long-term effects that didn’t fully hit until much later. Between that, COVID, and the continued isolation that came with dealing with the VA, I ended up as a disabled veteran. The flight sim hobby was something I got into partly because of those PTSD symptoms, and because I needed a structured, immersive outlet that felt familiar but safe. These days I’m basically 100% isolated except for my wife. I talk to a few people online here and there, but I have no local friends. I’m a hermit outside of grocery runs or the occasional walk when the weather cooperates. I tried getting into flight simulation—specifically Digital Combat Simulator. It’s a deep, high-fidelity sim, and the complexity really drew me in. I figured that since it’s military-related, I’d find community and maybe even some camaraderie. I’m not a “social justice warrior,” but I believe in equal rights and I stand with marginalized people—especially now, when extremist views openly permeate American politics. I don’t agree with any of that, and I don’t hide it.(edit: Maybe I am technically a social justice warrior since I am an advocate for minority rights, have helped movements, etc. I just don't like the term SJW because the right has weaponized that into yet another slur or... ...degration of standing up for others. I personally don't think I need a title to stand up for what is right and for other people's rights. I am not saying I am correct here. Just try to give perspective, since a few of y'all have commented down below.) Before this, I did content creation and built up about 80,000 followers on TikTok. I was proud of that. Then my account got banned and I never recovered. My motivation to create has only faded since. Back to the flight sim community: I expected a mix of people—real pilots, former military, aviation nerds, and kids who just want to make things go boom. What I didn’t expect was how heavily right-leaning a lot of the spaces are, or how absolutely comfortable they are with bigotry. Some groups are just cesspools. Others pretend to be “safe spaces for everyone” while letting hateful ideas thrive. And when I push back against that bullshit, I become the problem, because I’m apparently in the minority. I’m honestly close to giving up on the hobby entirely and sinking even deeper into isolation. The community aspect was the whole reason I got into it, and if the community is this toxic, then I don’t want to be part of it. If you read all this, thank you. I really do appreciate it. The most depressing realization is that these types of people exist in every space and they’re becoming more emboldened every day. And this is exactly how my minority friends feel in every aspect of their lives. When I stand up for people who are targeted and marginalized, I get pushed out and attacked right alongside them. I’m not worried about the attacks on me personally. I’m frustrated that I can’t make any headway when these people simply do not want to change. The U.S. military absolutely has an extremism and white-supremacy problem. I should have known better—rooting out extremism was literally part of my job. But I tried to have hope because I was told to be hopeful. I don’t think I’ll make that mistake again. ——————————————————————————————Front page edit: I know I say this often, but thank you for the engagement. It seriously does mean something to me. I don't just say that to get more engagement. Talking to some of y'all is some days the only socialization I give myself. I am working through the comments trying to reply to anybody who took time to give advice or try to have a conversation. I didn't expect this post in particular to get any sort of traction, so please bear with me. I will be responding to you in the quickest pace that I can. I just do not want any of you all to feel ignored, especially when you are putting effort in my direction. I just ask that those of you that have had similar experiences or those of you that are reading these types of experiences for the first time, I ask that you try to do what you can to police these nasty people and push them out of these spaces. If you are not in a position to do that, then as many of you have recommended, we need to make our own spaces and permeate them with people that deserve and want to be there. Either way, thank you for continuously helping motivate me to continue on through all of the stupid shit that this world continues to dish out. Y'all are amazing and I am extremely grateful to have each and every one of you in my life to whatever capacity you are. Seriously, thank you!

item.title: My wife passed her citizenship test today, our waiter overheard us, brought her this, and got teary eyed when he congratulated her.
item.description: He apologized for getting emotional and told us that he and his wife are close to citizenship, but were told the process is on hold indefinitely because of their country of origin. So please pray, burn sage, dance in the rain, or whatever for them. My wife and I are going to hook them up with the resources we used and with everyone that helped us. The only thing that dampened my wife's celebration was that we both got our citizenship under the shittiest administration this country will ever see. Remember to stay safe, stay cool, stay hydrated, and most importantly, stay fresh cheese bags.

item.title: Fuck Off With The Nazi Shit.
item.description: Honestly sick of it. Get your shit together, Imgur mod team. It is not hard. Follow these 4 rules and you will make the site much better. 1. Mature content tagged as mature should be left the fuck alone. That is what the FUCKING tag is there for. 2. Remove all the sex ads. For a group of prudish braindead assholes, you sure are willing to accept ad revenue from some fucked up places. 3. Stop banning people for posting sexy stuff as long as it is tagged properly. Killing your already limited content base is just stupid. 4. START banning the Nazis and their shit. Posting anything that is Pro Nazi should be taken down and they should get banned. It is a matter of morality and you fuckers refuse to have anything close to morals.

item.title: Return of the Meme: 1550 (quackmobile)
item.description:
lets get this bread
So many nightmares last night that I feel absolutely exhausted this morning. and more hopeless and dejected than usual.
I dreamed I reconnected with a woman i had a crush on in grade school and it ended in horrible divorce
I dreamed I was kicked out of a summer camp by offering to teach the kids spear martial arts in case of a zombie invasion: only to learn when I returned to civilization the camp was obliterated by a zombie invasion and had to be napalmed to prevent said outbreak from spreading
I'm not who I wanted to be 20 years ago. I never will be that person I wanted to be; secure, with a family and an enjoyable job and enough funds to take my family on the vacations my family took me on when I was a kid to see glaciers, dinosaur bones in hillsides, and prismatic hot springs. I actually walked on that glacier in Canada. It's apparently now gone.
746 AM and I'm already thinking about slipping whiskey into my coffee even though I haven't even imbibed alcohol since last week.
I'm always amused when Pippin lets me hold him like this, or hold him like the old school brick cellphones. sometimes I'll poke his belly and make beep noises and say "hello?" but he doesn't like it much lol.
If only we kept this lesson. "AI" will destroy society without even firing a rocket.
I also bottled what is likely going to be the last mead I ever make yesterday: a mead made with basswood honey I sourced while visiting @nichoDriver for @sisipherr's wedding back last year. I fermented it to dry, and then re-added basswood honey to sweeten it back up after having aged on American and Hungarian oak for two months. I figured the fun flavor profile of the Basswood, being light and airy almost like what a honey cotton candy might taste like would work well with the vanilla and caramel notes imparted by American oak, as well as the extra tannins. I just don't have the money to buy honey anymore to ferment. I'm cutting costs on everything from food to hobbies at this point. I can't even afford to use the Christmas money sent by my parents on anything other than rent at this point.
LET IT KILL US ALL!
An acquaintance who runs one of the largest wine tour companies in the area said flat out he would absolutely LOVE to hire me and would in a heartbeat (in fact, he tried to hire me out of jeep touring 3 years ago) can't right now because the whole tourism thing is pretty much dead right now here. hashtag ThanksRepublicans.
Cranes are VERY different birds from Herons. entirely different family. also largely different diet, cranes will eat grain and veggies, herons generally don't.
I wish I had the kind of 'tism that was good with numbers AND excited about them because then I could work as an accountant.
I'm terrified anymore about everything. It is almost impossible to see beauty in the world... especially when it costs money to go outside, practically. trying to also save up gas money for some distance birding on January 1st to start a semi-serious Yavapai County Yearlist attempt for birding. Trying to design a route that might get me as many as 75 bird species on the first.
I have enough rent for December.
I have home-working gigs with two different "AI" companies and NEITHER have tasks right now, either, which is telling. I only was able to make $200 from both gigs put together last week. I think the bubble is going to burst in the next week or two, and we'll all be as fucked as I am. And then all the rich smug fuckers will seal themselves up in the bunkers while chaos reigns. (I hope they do so we can concrete the fuckers in their vaults like some sort of sealed eldritch horror in a can.) Stick a bunch of spikes in the earth and put up signs about how this was not a place of virtue or valor, that inside lies the greatest evil humanity faced.
I don't have much in the way of hopes for a year from now, let alone tomorrow. But still I persist.
the dream
I suspect Ravens are sapient enough to have gods. But they definitely have no masters.
well, fuck.
this is fucking awesome. Okay: confession: I've realized I'm a feathery equivalent to a furry, I think. I resonate WAY TOO MUCH with species in the Aphelocoma genus of birds (specifically Woodhouse's Scrub-Jay and Mexican Jay.) I've even figured out some costuming that doesn't require a feathersuit: basically a blue Bombodil suit with a grey vest, the Arizona bolo tie I had custom made years ago, and some silver jewelry and a belt-buckle I want to design based on the traditional I'toli (Man-of-the-Maze) you see in a lot of indigenous art of the southwest. And then a mask sorta like you see in the costume above. Grey Cowboy boots, too. There would also be a wizard version that basically uses my Bronze-age wizard garb but with a blue-grey wizard cloak and aforementioned mask. (speaking of, @14367, how goes the wand design?) Need to figure out how to do the mask, though. and figure out how to be able to see though it without glasses. One Idea I had was to attach my Pince-Nez glasses to the beak of the mask... I already have the suit, and most of the silver jewelry, I just need to do the mask, the belt buckle, and the grey cowboy boots. Hilariously, this would all be cheaper than the last two pieces I need for my Bronze-age wizard, Ph'atarkarantz. (Proto-Celtic for "Bird Friend.) Namely the sword, a proper period cloak/cape based on Bog finds, and proper period shoes.
Probably as a compliment, or I'd retort with a generic Skyrim line. What a great burn.
Ancestral Flamingos, y'all.
Coming up soon: a post where an Ornithologist correlated every type of Mountain Dew ever made with species in the Tanager family. Because my posts aren't fucking niche enough as it is.
Or a witch. Witchery is a trade.
I've decided I will never write my version of "don't build the torment nexus" because someone will be inspired to build the goddamn torment nexus.
Coal is similarly lovecraftian.
Some hardcore birders HATE the Merlin app. I find it helpful as a starting point.
Welcome to the Quackcar.
BORB
it's me fuck
Mood. I have so much useless hobby shit from previous hobbies that can't be legally resold (like my wine stash)
But maybe I can live long enough to see the wealthy reap what they've sown. So I can point and laugh as i pour concrete and earth into their bunkers.
fucking mood.
Pippin Tax! Today's Message from Pippin: "Poor Baby. Good baby. Whatdoin? PIPPPIIIIN!" ______ 1) Are you on the run to a safe place and passing through Arizona on your way to safer grounds? My apartment is open to you to crash at, and it is a safe space. Pippin and I will make you a meal and gladly share tea, wine, or mead with you. 2) Hey! Take your meds with a full glass of water, please. Do it for Pippin, or Space Mom, or better yet, do it for yourself. 3) Ĝefeloað wē. We will carry on. 4) all funds from the sales of items at these two links will be sent to support charities aiding to fight for Trans rights in the US (not just T-shirts!) https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74812801-all-conures-are-anarchists https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74811778-whiptail-pride 5) Since multiple people have requested this over the last two weeks or so, my ko-fi is: https://ko-fi.com/codyandpippin 6) we have a discord! https://discord.gg/rXqyS3te
